baseSupply().details: use this any time you need to query supply

params._amount: uint256 amount of Pana to mint

deposit(uint256,address,uint256).notice: allow approved address to deposit an asset for PANA

depositForRedemption(uint256,address).notice: allow approved address to deposit reserve token for available PANA. No new PANA is minted.

manage(address,uint256).notice: allow approved address to withdraw assets

mintForNFTTreasury(uint256).notice: allow approved Assurance/Parametrics Insurance NFT Treasury to mint Pana from Master Treasury.

tokenValue(address,uint256).notice: returns PANA valuation of asset as 1:100 The protocol has no intrinsic valuation for external tokens This function values any given asset at 100 PANA Only to be used for valuation of RESERVE TOKENS Not to be used to valuate LP tokens
